noAward.littleText: This delta has been rejected. The length of your comment suggests that you haven't explained how /u/USERNAME changed your view (comment rule 4). Please edit your comment and include a short explanation - it will be automatically re-scanned.
noAward.op: You cannot award OP a delta as the moderators feel that allowing so would send the wrong message. If you were trying show the OP how to award a delta, please do so without using the delta symbol unless it's included in a reddit quote.
noAward.db3: You cannot award DeltaBot a delta.
noAward.self: You cannot award yourself a delta.
noAward.issueCount: You have ISSUECOUNT issues with your delta.

en-us.hiddenParamsComment: This is hidden text for DB3 to parse. Please contact the author of DB3 if you see this
